verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to the \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* of \w pride|strong="H1348"\w*, to the \w drunkards|strong="H7910"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, whose \w glorious|strong="H6643"\w* \w beauty|strong="H8597"\w* \add is\add* a \w fading|strong="H5034"\w* \w flower|strong="H6731"\w*, which \add are\add* on the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fat|strong="H8081"\w* \w valleys|strong="H1516"\w* of them that are \w overcome|strong="H1986"\w* with \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*!\f + \fr 28.1 \ft overcome: Heb. broken\f*

Behold, the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* hath a \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* and strong \w one|strong="H0533"\w*, \add which\add* as a \w tempest|strong="H2230"\w* of \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* \add and\add* a \w destroying|strong="H6986"\w* \w storm|strong="H8178"\w*, as a \w flood|strong="H2230"\w* of \w mighty|strong="H3524"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w*, shall cast \w down|strong="H3240"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* with the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

The \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* of \w pride|strong="H1348"\w*, the \w drunkards|strong="H7910"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, shall be \w trodden|strong="H7429"\w* under \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*:\f + \fr 28.3 \ft under…: Heb. with feet\f*

And the \w glorious|strong="H6643"\w* \w beauty|strong="H8597"\w*, which \add is\add* on the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fat|strong="H8081"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w*, shall be a \w fading|strong="H5034"\w* \w flower|strong="H6733"\w*, \add and\add* as the hasty \w fruit|strong="H1061"\w* before the \w summer|strong="H7019"\w*; which \add when\add* he that \w looketh|strong="H7200"\w* upon it \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w*, while it is yet in his \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* he eateth it \w up|strong="H1104"\w*.\f + \fr 28.4 \ft eateth: Heb. swalloweth\f*

¶ In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* be for a \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* of \w glory|strong="H6643"\w*, and for a \w diadem|strong="H6843"\w* of \w beauty|strong="H8597"\w*, unto the \w residue|strong="H7605"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*,

And for a \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* to him that \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and for \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* to them that \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* to the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

¶ But \w they|strong="H0428"\w* also have \w erred|strong="H7686"\w* through \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, and through strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w* are out of the \w way|strong="H8582"\w*; the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* have \w erred|strong="H7686"\w* through strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*, they are swallowed \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, they are out of the \w way|strong="H8582"\w* through strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*; they \w err|strong="H7686"\w* in \w vision|strong="H7203"\w*, they \w stumble|strong="H6328"\w* \add in\add* \w judgment|strong="H6417"\w*.

For all \w tables|strong="H7979"\w* are \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w vomit|strong="H6892"\w* \add and\add* \w filthiness|strong="H6675"\w*, \add so that there is\add* no \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \add clean\add*.

¶ Whom shall he \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1844"\w*? and whom shall he make to \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w doctrine|strong="H8052"\w*? \add them that are\add* \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* from the \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*, \add and\add* \w drawn|strong="H6267"\w* from the \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w*.\f + \fr 28.9 \ft doctrine: Heb. the hearing?\f*

For \w precept|strong="H6673"\w* \add must be\add* upon \w precept|strong="H6673"\w*, \w precept|strong="H6673"\w* upon \w precept|strong="H6673"\w*; \w line|strong="H6957"\w* upon \w line|strong="H6957"\w*, \w line|strong="H6957"\w* upon \w line|strong="H6957"\w*; here a \w little|strong="H2191"\w*, \add and\add* there a \w little|strong="H2191"\w*:\f + \fr 28.10 \ft must be: or, hath been\f*

For with \w stammering|strong="H3934"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* and \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* will he \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* to this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 28.11 \ft stammering…: Heb. stammerings of lip\f*\f + \fr 28.11 \ft will…: or, he hath spoken\f*

To whom he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w rest|strong="H4496"\w* \add wherewith\add* ye may cause the \w weary|strong="H5889"\w* to \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*; and this \add is\add* the \w refreshing|strong="H4774"\w*: yet they \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.

But the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was unto them \w precept|strong="H6673"\w* upon \w precept|strong="H6673"\w*, \w precept|strong="H6673"\w* upon \w precept|strong="H6673"\w*; \w line|strong="H6957"\w* upon \w line|strong="H6957"\w*, \w line|strong="H6957"\w* upon \w line|strong="H6957"\w*; here a \w little|strong="H2191"\w*, \add and\add* there a \w little|strong="H2191"\w*; that they might \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* \w backward|strong="H0268"\w*, and be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, and \w snared|strong="H3369"\w*, and \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*.

¶ Wherefore \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, ye \w scornful|strong="H3944"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, that \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which \add is\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Because ye have \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We have \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, and with \w hell|strong="H7585"\w* are \w we|strong="H6213"\w* at \w agreement|strong="H2374"\w*; when the \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w* \w scourge|strong="H7752"\w* shall pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w*, it shall not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto us: for we have \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w* our \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w*, and under \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w* have we \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* ourselves:

¶ Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I \w lay|strong="H3245"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* for a foundation a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, a \w tried|strong="H0976"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, a \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w corner|strong="H6438"\w* \add stone\add*, a \w sure|strong="H3245"\w* \w foundation|strong="H4143"\w*: he that \w believeth|strong="H0539"\w* shall not make \w haste|strong="H2363"\w*.

\w Judgment|strong="H4941"\w* also will I \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* to the \w line|strong="H6957"\w*, and \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* to the \w plummet|strong="H4949"\w*: and the \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* shall sweep \w away|strong="H3261"\w* the \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* of \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*, and the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* shall \w overflow|strong="H7857"\w* the hiding \w place|strong="H5643"\w*.

¶ And your \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with \w death|strong="H4194"\w* shall be \w disannulled|strong="H3722"\w*, and your \w agreement|strong="H2380"\w* with \w hell|strong="H7585"\w* shall not \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*; when the \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w* \w scourge|strong="H7752"\w* shall pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w*, then ye shall be trodden \w down|strong="H4823"\w* by it.\f + \fr 28.18 \ft trodden…: Heb. a treading down to it\f*

From the \w time|strong="H1767"\w* that it goeth \w forth|strong="H5674"\w* it shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* you: for \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* by \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* shall it pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, by \w day|strong="H3117"\w* and by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: and it shall be a \w vexation|strong="H2113"\w* only \add to\add* \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* the \w report|strong="H8052"\w*.\f + \fr 28.19 \ft to…: or, when he shall make you to understand doctrine\f*

For the \w bed|strong="H4702"\w* is \w shorter|strong="H7114"\w* than that \add a man\add* can \w stretch|strong="H8311"\w* himself \add on it:\add* and the \w covering|strong="H4541"\w* \w narrower|strong="H6887"\w* than that he can \w wrap|strong="H3664"\w* himself \add in it\add*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* as \add in\add* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Perazim|strong="H6559"\w*, he shall be \w wroth|strong="H7264"\w* as \add in\add* the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, that he may \w do|strong="H6213"\w* his \w work|strong="H4639"\w*, his \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*; and bring to \w pass|strong="H5647"\w* his \w act|strong="H5656"\w*, his \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w act|strong="H5656"\w*.

Now therefore be ye not \w mockers|strong="H3887"\w*, lest your \w bands|strong="H4147"\w* be made \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*: for I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* from the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* a \w consumption|strong="H3617"\w*, even \w determined|strong="H2782"\w* upon the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
¶ Give ye \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w speech|strong="H0565"\w*.

Doth the \w plowman|strong="H2790"\w* \w plow|strong="H2790"\w* all \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to \w sow|strong="H2232"\w*? doth he \w open|strong="H6605"\w* and break the \w clods|strong="H7702"\w* of his \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*?

When he hath made \w plain|strong="H7737"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* thereof, doth he not cast \w abroad|strong="H6327"\w* the \w fitches|strong="H7100"\w*, and \w scatter|strong="H2236"\w* the \w cummin|strong="H3646"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7760"\w* in the \w principal|strong="H7795"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* and the \w appointed|strong="H5567"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* and the \w rie|strong="H3698"\w* in their \w place|strong="H1367"\w*?\f + \fr 28.25 \ft the principal…: or, the wheat in the principal place, and barley in the appointed place\f*\f + \fr 28.25 \ft rie: or, spelt\f*\f + \fr 28.25 \ft place: Heb. border?\f*

For his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* doth \w instruct|strong="H3256"\w* him to \w discretion|strong="H4941"\w*, \add and\add* doth \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* him.\f + \fr 28.26 \ft For…: or, And he bindeth it in such sort as his God doth teach him\f*

For the \w fitches|strong="H7100"\w* are not \w threshed|strong="H1758"\w* with a threshing \w instrument|strong="H2742"\w*, neither is a \w cart|strong="H5699"\w* \w wheel|strong="H0212"\w* turned \w about|strong="H5437"\w* upon the \w cummin|strong="H3646"\w*; but the \w fitches|strong="H7100"\w* are beaten \w out|strong="H2251"\w* with a \w staff|strong="H4294"\w*, and the \w cummin|strong="H3646"\w* with a \w rod|strong="H7626"\w*.

\w Bread|strong="H3899"\w* \add corn\add* is \w bruised|strong="H1854"\w*; because he will not \w ever|strong="H5331"\w* be \w threshing|strong="H0156"\w* it, nor \w break|strong="H2000"\w* \add it with\add* the \w wheel|strong="H1536"\w* of his \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*, nor \w bruise|strong="H1854"\w* it \add with\add* his \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

This also cometh \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \add which\add* is \w wonderful|strong="H6381"\w* in \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, \add and\add* \w excellent|strong="H1431"\w* in \w working|strong="H8454"\w*.
